doc.title: Multiple Orgasm

credit.role: Shaddow of camera operator on ground

doc.plot: The first shot of the film is of the filmmaker, Brabara Hammer, pointing her camera to the ground and zooming into her shaddow. Superimposed is an extreme close-up of a clitoris, superimposed over a series of static shots of smooth, sensual rock formations. A hand appears and begins to play with the vigina, and the film slowly evolves into the vigina's owner masturbating. The last shot is of the woman's face as she experiences her orgasm. There is no sound; the viewer's tense and uncomfortable breathing provides the soundtrack.
